source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.
source_objects.title: Influence

items.title: Reading a Group: Using Group dynamics to get ahead in life

visible_instructors.job_title: IT and Business Professional, Database Developer, ACE, ENCE
visible_instructors.title: John Boyle
visible_instructors.name: John

items.headline: Learn how groups work to better understand what makes them effective, so you can make the group work to your advantage.
objectives_summary: You will understand different types of group and their different function
You will understand what makes up a group and how groups work
See how ablity to "read" a group will make you better able to understand what makes the group tick

items.title: Negotiation Skills Simplified

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced IT Professional and Personal Development Coach
visible_instructors.title: Syed Mukhtar
visible_instructors.name: Syed

items.headline: Simple tips on negotiation skills to be better prepared to influence the decision of your opponents
objectives_summary: Negotiation skills
How to be highly skilled in negotiations and win deals

items.title: Listen to Understand- Increase Influence by Listening Skills
items.headline: Using Listening Skills to Build More Influence and Better Relationships
objectives_summary: Prerequisites for listening nicely
5 statements to assess your listening skill and how to improve it
How to encourage others to share more

items.title: How to Say 'No' & Win
items.headline: ...converting challenges into opportunities...
objectives_summary: Disagreeing with people without creating conflict
Being and being seen as assertive
How to create an opportunity of negotiation

items.title: Master People skills: Connect, Build Trust and Read People
items.headline: Build Strong connection with People, Charm People and Read Others mind with Ease
objectives_summary: Gain insights into how people tick by understanding self and others better
Know Your Emotional Quotient to Connect with others
Learn Simple and Implementable Strategies to Master One to One Communication

items.title: Persuasion Mastery
items.headline: How to communicate like a pro
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to master the skills to become more persuasive and influential in their everyday lives
A strong understanding of the underlying psychological principles of persuasion and influence
The best way to position yourself as an authority figure to become more persuasive

items.title: Understanding Nonverbal Communication in 2021
items.headline: Learn how to read and interpret body language, facial expressions, and more while perfecting your body language as well
objectives_summary: Types of Nonverbal Communication
Behavioral Psychology
Types of Nonverbal Cues

items.title: Rapid Anxiety Relief Remedies: Authentic Confidence Course

visible_instructors.job_title: Revealing How I Raised Myself From Failure to Success
visible_instructors.title: Danny Cohen
visible_instructors.name: Danny

items.headline: The Drug Free Fix to 'Beat Do-Nothingism' Build Esteem Overcome Social Anxiety & Experience the Joy of Feeling GOOD
objectives_summary: Make Powerful First Impressions
Have Confident Body Language
Know What To Say

items.title: What Influential Women Do Differently

visible_instructors.job_title: Influence Agent, Innovation and Creativity Facilitator
visible_instructors.title: Nataliya Pereira
visible_instructors.name: Nataliya

items.headline: Indirect Influence Tools for four types of messages you transfer even being silent
objectives_summary: plan the desired image of yourself, your product and your service and get it right from the first contact
get more trust right from the first contact, be more confident, look more confident
understand what your body does wrong nonverbally that makes your image weaker

items.title: How to build massive self confidence
items.headline: 7 steps to insane self confidence.
objectives_summary: How to create killer self confidence - Personally and Professionally
Body Language secrets of the masters
How to become attractive through self esteem

items.title: Dark Psychology
items.headline: Manipulation, Mind Control, Lie Detection, Body Language, Persuasion, Influence, Serial Killers, and Psychopaths
objectives_summary: Recognize phobias and fears, and distinguish between irrational and rational ones.
Explore your dark side and contemplate human psychology in that light.
Understand Machiavellians.

items.title: Conversational (Covert) Hypnosis
items.headline: Master the how, when, why, and where to use covert conversational hypnosis
objectives_summary: To influence and persuade people covertly
To build rapport quickly and effectively not just with conscious but also unconscious
To develop advanced negotiation skills

items.title: How to look impeccable and achieve business success
items.headline: Find out all the secrets of impeccably dressed men and watch your credibility and success in business reach new heights.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to present yourself to achieve the success you want.
You will learn to put together outfits for any business context.
You will learn what a business wardrobe should contain.

items.title: How to be liked
items.headline: Learn how to make an impact and win trust
objectives_summary: You will be better equipped to make a positive impact when interacting with other people
You will appreciate the importance of developing influencing skills
You will be better equipped to win people's trust

items.title: Get Started Writing a Book
items.headline: Everything you need to know from writing, editing, self-publishing, and marketing the book inside of you.
objectives_summary: Getting Started Writing a Book
Getting Pencil To Paper (Or Fingers To Computer)
Publishing Your Book on Kindle and Amazon as a book or ebook

items.title: Creating Persuasive Presentations
items.headline: How to Develop, Design and Deliver Visual Presentations That Mesmerize Audiences
objectives_summary: Slide-by-slide process of designing your own presentation.
Best presentation practices and useful PowerPoint tricks that includes basic presentation knowledge which you might not be aware of.
Deliver powerful, high impact business presentations that audiences remember and act on.
